attributes.action: abolish parking charges in all uk hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i believe that it is moraly wrong to charge visitors,patients and hospital workers any sort of fee to attend a hospital and that it will be an ever increasing amount,it seems that this is
being used to raise funds [profit even] from something that we as members of the british public have already paid for and it will become just one of many new charges that will be levied against us in due course.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "abolish parking charges in all uk hospitals."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12568.asp

Prime Minister's Office
